title: Thank you Riot Games
body:
Thank you Riot for allowing your client to crash every 10 games.
Thank you Riot for making me close the game in order to be able to recconect
Thank you Riot for allowing remakes even if somebody recconects.
Thank you Riot for giving me low priority because of your game.


XDD ok....that was weird...i got over it by playing tryndamere and unleashing my fury upon the enemy team.
{{champion:23}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:23}} 
Edit : this post will be deleted in 10 minutes 
Reason : Preservation of ones own pride and ego

replies.body:
The root of your problem sounds like a poor connection to our servers. A poor connection can cause delays, freezes, crashes, and even low-priority queue if not dealt with in a timely manner. I highly recommend checking out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as I feel it could resolve a lot of the issues you've mentioned in this post.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Also a question,does the punishment for afk get lighter with time,for example will it switch back to 5 minutes of low priority,if i dont afk for a longer time {{champion:26}} {{champion:245}}

Yes, your Leaverbuster penalties will start over on the track so long as you consistently play without disconnecting for a while.

I hope this helps.

Hey Targo,it happened again (this time it was my fault) :((,now i have 20 minutes of low priority,is there an exact number of games until the punishment lowers. (this thread turning into a leaverbuster faq)

There isn't an exact number of games, it simply looks for **trends**, so a trend of *not leaving games* is likely to start decaying your current standing with the Leaverbuster system.

Hope that helps, if you see more disconnections, I strongly suggest working through that connection guide I linked above.
